name: ModifyRegistriesEvent
description: Fired during startup after builtin registries are constructed. For vanilla registries, this event is fired after vanilla entries are registered but before modded entries. For modded registries, this event is fired before any entry is registered. This event can be used to register callbacks to the registry. This event cannot be used to modify datapack registries. This event is not cancellable. This event is fired on the mod-specific event bus, on both logical sides.

methods.name: getRegistry
exceptions: IllegalArgumentException - if the registry does not exist
methods.description: Retrieve a builtin registry by its key.
